price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒߠߋ ߥߊߕߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߡߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߘߌߣߊ߬ ߒ ߞߊ߲ߘߊ߫
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
